1:
Help, Yahweh, for the godly have disappeared;
\q the faithful have vanished.
3:
Yahweh, cut off all flattering lips,
\q every tongue declaring great things.
\q
4:
These are those who have said, "With our tongues will we prevail.
\q When our lips speak, who can be master over us?"
5:
"Because of violence against the poor, because of the groans of the needy,
\q I will arise," says Yahweh.
\q "I will provide the safety for which they long."
6:
The words of Yahweh are pure words,
\q like silver purified in a furnace on the earth,
\q refined seven times.
\q
7:
You are Yahweh! You keep them.
\q You preserve the godly people from this wicked generation and forever.
\q
8:
The wicked walk on every side
\q when evil is exalted among the children of mankind.
12:
\m
\d For the chief musician; set to the Sheminith. A psalm of David.
\q
